Text: Alright! Who's the next challenger?!
...W-Wait...I need a break...

*huff, huff* What the heck is going on...? We keep
losing and losing! It never ends...!
I can still keep going! Come on, stand up!
Don't tell me you're all already finished!
You've gotta be joking...!

Hey, where do you think you're going? I can still
fight!
Enough! I ain't sticking around for this!
Wh-What...?!
Well, well, looks like everyone ran away.
Oh well. I can't force them to stay.
...Oh! You're still here! Will you fight me?
Of course not!

I'm not saying this sarcastically or anything,
but...seriously, aren't you strong enough already?
...No, I'm nowhere near enough.

I've realized my own inadequacy. That's why I left
the Seven Blades to train. And yet...

To my shame, I was complacent. I fooled myself into
thinking I was strong and forgot just how powerless
I had been...

That changed when I met Mundane. His power and
beautiful swordplay woke me up.
That's why...I have to catch up to him.

I see... An admirable fighting spirit. It's so
naively pure that it gives me chills.
...What are you trying to say?

Like I said before, Mundane is extraordinary.
No matter how strong your resolve, reality isn't so
kind.

Meaning, no matter how hard you try, you can't
become Mundane.
I...can't become Mundane...?
...Can't become Mundane...

...M-Maybe I was too blunt. But that's just the
reality—
Yes! I can't become Mundane!
...Huh?

Wanting to be like Mundane, needing to be like
him... That mindset was my shackle.

Trying to imitate him from the start was my
mistake... It all makes sense now.

Thank you, Goldy Gilded. Thank you for making me
realize.
U-Uhh... You're welcome...

I thought of starting off by changing my training
method, but...I'm quite weighed down.
Well, you're still wearing those weights.
True!

*sigh* You must be tired as well. How about calling
it a day? I'm heading back to the inn.

Yes, I'll do the same. I'll let you know if anything
else comes up.

Jeez... Talking to her is exhausting... I wouldn't
have made fun of her if I knew it'd end up like
this.
Goldy Gilded!
Will you just let me rest?!

This is no time to be resting! Look what's in the
hallway...!

...A challenge letter? And it's anonymous...
Super suspicious.

"Tomorrow night, waiting in the forest near the
arena"...

This doesn't seem like something a renowned
swordsman would do. Could be a prank...
Even so, I'm going.

I won't ignore the challenge. I won't flee from any
challenge!
